author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/resident-evil-requiem/

Resident Evil Requiem is now available for pre-order!
 
In addition to the standard edition, a deluxe edition packed with extra content is also available to pre-order.
All pre-orders come with a bonus: Grace’s Costume: Apocalypse.
 
Resident Evil Requiem is the highly anticipated ninth title in the mainline Resident Evil series. 
 
Prepare to escape death in a heart-stopping experience that will chill you to your core. Technological advancements combined with the development team's depth of experience combine in a story with rich characters and gameplay that's more immersive than ever before. 
 
Resident Evil Requiem
Release Date: February 27, 2026
Platform: PlayStation®5
Genre: Survival Horror
Players: Single-player
©CAPCOM

#ps5 #ps5games #residentevil #residentevilrequiem
title: Resident Evil Requiem - Road to Requiem | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/ark-survival-ascended/

Cowabunga dude! Tie on your ninja masks, grab a slice of pizza, and unleash your favorite half-shelled heroes or diabolical villains with the 'ARK x Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles' Cosmetic Pack!

This premium mod lets you jump into the action with the iconic looks of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles - Leonardo, Donatello, Raphael, and Michelangelo – complete with signature weapons and radical voiceovers. And of course, the turtles aren't complete without their Master Splinter and their friends April O' Neil & Casey Jones. If you prefer to cause chaos, suit up as Shredder or one of his Foot clan, and unleash a horde of Mousers! 

#ps5 #ps5games #arksurvivalascended
title: Ark: Survival Ascended x Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP2467-CUSA16473_00-ASTRONEER0000000

In the ASTRONEER: Megatech DLC, players unlock the ability to build massive Megastructure projects that will test their Basebuilding skills using new and existing technology. Each Megastructure will have its own unique identity and gameplay, unlocking new possibilities and rewards. Harness the power of Megatech to take Basebuilding and Automation to a whole new level! This DLC will be completely compatible with existing saves, and builds off of any progress you’ve already made in game, feel free to start fresh, or load up your existing saves and start building!

In addition, this DLC will be released alongside a free update for all players. The free update will include new items and the ability to create a Megastructure that will allow automated interplanetary transportation. That means you will be able to move resources and technology between planets!

#ps4 #ps4games #astroneer
title: Astroneer - Megatech Release Date Trailer | PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Loot up and tee off this season in PGA TOUR 2K25, where mayhem meets golf! Play rounds, rack up XP, and progress through the brand new Clubhouse Pass.

The leaderboards in Ranked Tours and Ranked Matchmaking have been wiped clean, giving you a fresh shot to compete, climb, and claim all-new rewards.

#ps5 #ps5games #borderlandsgame
title: PGA Tour 2K25 - Season 4 Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/lost-in-random-the-eternal-die/

Return to the Black Die and take on Wager Rollins’ ultimate challenge in the Gauntlet Update - a free content update for all players of Lost in Random: The Eternal Die!

Face new twists in Wager’s Weekly Gauntlet, earn Tokens, and unlock stylish, account-bound prizes in The Sanctuary.

This free update includes:
• Wager’s Weekly Gauntlet - new weekly challenges full of surprises
• Token rewards & The Gauntlet Shop
• New weapon upgrades, relics, and ability cards
• Quality-of-life improvements & bug fixes

Fortune favours those who dare to roll again - and Wager is watching.

🎲 Play now on PS5! 🎲

#ps5 #ps5games #lostinrandom
title: Lost in Random: The Eternal Die - Wager’s Gauntlet Update Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/NBATHERUN

We’re taking it back to the streets. 

NBA THE RUN is a fast-paced, online 3v3 street basketball game, played above-the-rim and packed with posterizing moments, ankle-breaking tricks and a unique, signature style. 

Take your favorite NBA stars to iconic streetball courts around the world and stack wins, earn cred and become the GOAT of THE RUN.

Coming in 2026. Wishlist now!

#ps5 #ps5games #nba
title: NBA The Run - Teaser Trailer | PS5 Games
